name: Cat simulator (itch) (ChocolateCookieBro)
description:
You are in a room with a cat. You can give the cat toys, drinks, and food but you have to choose which one the cat gets. As you continue caring for the cat, the cat may go to sleep if you make some specific choices and you can leave for once and for all.

Made with Tuesday JS visual novel engine:

https://kirill-live.itch.io/tuesday-js

Main bg music by Mixkit:

https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/ambient/
